layout.title: Look into their eyes
layout.description: "Look into their eyes" is an online exhibition showcasing the work of graffiti artist Benzi Brofman, following the events of October 7th, to raise awareness for the release of the hostages.

About.paragraph_1: Benzi (Ben Zion) Brofman is an Israeli Muralist / Street Artist. Benzi was born in 1983 and lives in Migdal HaEmek, in the north of Israel. He took his first steps in the world of art at the age of 4, when he started experimenting with different creative materials. Benzi is a self-taught artist, who never formally studied art and made his way into the graffiti and street art world on his own. He began expressing interest in the world of street art in his teens and later became a full-time Graffiti Artist. Today Benzi designs walls for a wide variety of businesses in Israel (such as Aroma Espresso Bar, Golda Ice Cream, Cafe Cafe, Sarona Market, etc.), High-Tech offices, sports complexes, urban projects to improve the city's appearance, and more. He also leaves his mark in different cities around the world (including Amsterdam, Moscow, Vienna, Barcelona, ​​London and Berlin). Benzi's preferred art style is creating realistic portraits in black and white with touches of color. Alongside his business work, Benzi takes part in voluntary and community projects to promote social issues, such as bullying among children, and support for human rights.
About.paragraph_2: On October 6th, 2023, just a few hours before the terrible massacre, Benzi was invited to paint live at the Unity Music Festival in Re’im (after which the Nova festival started). Contrary to his original plans to stay until Saturday, he returned home the same day. Since the October 7th massacre, Benzi decided to put on hold all his projects in favor of supporting the families of the victims and the hostages. He first painted portraits for families who lost their loved ones and held graffiti workshops for families evacuated from the Otef Gaza area to Emek Izrael. Later, he began to paint large-scale murals for the return of the hostages from Gaza.
About.paragraph_3: So far Benzi has painted about 100 portraits to commemorate the victims of 7/10 and the fallen soldiers and portraits to raise awareness of the hostages alongside large murals in several cities in Israel and Europe (among them a 20 meter high mural on a building in Berlin), which have received a lot of attention on social media and in the press. The paintings were presented during April 2024 in a unique exhibition that combines an audio-visual show called "Look into their eyes", which allowed visitors to look into their eyes up close and get to know the stories behind the paintings.
About.paragraph_4: Alongside the project of support and commemoration paintings, Benzi gives lectures in Israel and Europe about the artistic journey that has been going on since October 7 and initiates activities to support the Jewish communities abroad.

Look into their eyes has invested significant resources to help ensure access for all users, including people with disabilities, with the strong belief that every person has the right to live with dignity, equality, comfort, and independence.
accessibility.intro_paragraph_2: Digital accessibility is not just a target we aim to achieve, but an ongoing commitment that we carry in every aspect of our digital service delivery. We recognize that this requires continuous monitoring, improvement, and adaptation. In the sections below, we elaborate on the various efforts that have been undertaken to address our progress in ensuring digital accessibility for all.
accessibility.accessibility_initiative_1: A key element of our accessibility initiative is our development of a custom accessibility widget designed to help ensure that our website is accessible to users with a wide range of abilities. This widget is built with industry-standard accessibility methods and tools to meet the relevant version of

accessibility.feature_text_spacing: Increase or decrease text spacing for enhanced legibility.
accessibility.feature_line_height: Increase or decrease the line height for easier reading.
accessibility.feature_invert_colors: Invert colors for better contrast or a more accessible viewing experience.
accessibility.feature_gray_hues: Apply gray-scale color options for those with visual impairments.
accessibility.feature_underline_links: Make links more distinguishable by underlining them.
accessibility.feature_big_cursor: Use a larger cursor for easier navigation.
accessibility.feature_reading_guide: Highlight the area of text being read for better focus and understanding.
accessibility.feature_text_to_speech: Enable spoken feedback of text content for users with visual or cognitive impairments.
accessibility.feature_speech_to_text: Allow users to speak to input text, providing an alternative to typing.
accessibility.feature_disable_animations: Disable animations for users who may experience discomfort with motion.
